title: Worsh
author: Worsh
created_time: August 11, 2023, 02:00:07 PMLast edit: August 11, 2023, 02:33:33 PM by Worsh
content: 1. The Bounty campaign will be managed by Worsh Bitcointalk.2. 1200 Usdt Worth Tokens are to be divided according to the stakes accumulated amongst selected participants.3. The bounty program was launched on August 11rd, 2023 and will run until August 18th, 2023.4. Worsh Bitcointalk escrows the bounty reward tokens in Polygon. We don't, however,promise to cover the network fee.1. All participants must join Cerealguy official Telegram Channel,  Telegram Group,2. All participants must join Worsh Bitcointalk Telegram Group, Telegram Channel,3. Talking about the bounty program in the project chat group will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign andan instant ban from the company chat group. Please ask your bounty-related questions in the Worsh BitcointalkBounty Group,4. KYC is not required for the bounty campaign. However, the project's team has the right to require KYC for suspicious cases.5. Please note that any offensive or inappropriate behavior will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign.6. Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming are not allowed. You will be disqualified from the bounty programimmediately and all your accounts will be banned permanently. Brand new accounts are not allowed to join.7. Participants with a minimum of 50+ activity counts on Bitcointalk will be eligible to join the campaigns while,8. Participants can not change their wallet address after registration. Please double check your wallet address beforeregistration for any campaign.Twitter              60%Telegram          40%Note: Due to the bounty duration and pool, we have limited the number of participants for this bounty.Twitter:  First 220 approved participants.Week 1 (12.08 - 18.08 )--> Please submit your weekly report on this bounty thread <--Rewards:1. Have more than 501 followers: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 1501 followers: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 5001 followers: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 10,001 followers: 4 stakes/weekRules:  1. Every participant must follow cerealguy Twitter Page.2. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 501 followers.3. Participants have to make new tweets or retweet 5 tweets per week (maximum 1 retweet/day).4. Time gap between 2 retweets/tweets needs to be 10 hours minimum.5. Participants must use #cerealguy #polygon #crlgy #kucoin hashtags in every retweet or tweet.Fill the registration form:
